name: IsTriggerEmpty

arguments.name: demolision
arguments.desc: If true, small debris and vehicles are ignored

returns.name: maxpoint
returns.desc: World space point of highest point (largest Y coordinate) if not empty

examples: --highPoint[2] is the tallest point in trigger
description: This function will check if trigger is empty. If trigger contains any part of a body
it will return false and the highest point as second return value.
